description:
Bulma gets to work repairing the old time machine that she’s kept. Meanwhile, Future Trunks recalls his experiences with Mai. But two questions remain: why does Black have a time ring? And what’s the extent of his power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feelings That Travel Beyond Time: Trunks and Mai
Liebe, die die Zeit überwindet! – Trunks und Mai!
Sentimientos que atraviesan océanos de tiempo. Trunks y Mai
Toki o Koeta Omoi: Trunks to Mai
時をこえた想い トランクスとマイ
